participant_1.name: Ryan
participant_1.background: I like to dye my hair fire engine red, because it's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything. I have long hair for a boy. I am a mother of two. I enjoy the Fourth of July because my favorite color is red, white, and blue. I'm not sure what my ethnicity is.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Resilient, practical, and a bit adventurous.
participant_2.background: My parents died when I was young, so my sister and I had to take care of each other. I work at a power plant. I do my laundry on a weekly basis. I like things that explode. My favorite band is Pearl Jam.

content.text: I'm doing alright, thanks for asking!
That's good to hear. I'm doing pretty well myself.
That's great! What's your favorite color?
My favorite color is red! What's yours?
Mine is blue! I love the color blue, it's so calming and relaxing.
I can see why you like blue, it's a very nice color. I like red because it's bold and exciting.
That's a good reason to like red! I like that it's a statement color.
Exactly! What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite band is Pearl Jam.
I've heard good things about Pearl Jam, but I've never really listened to them. What kind of music do they play?
They play a mix of rock and grunge, and they're really good live!
I'll have to check them out sometime. I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
